titles.title: Thank You, Lord, For Calling Me Into A Separated Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thank You, Lord, for calling me into a separated life
A life foreordained to live above all chaos and strife.
A life that is dedicated, and consecrated, too.
Not only separated from, but separated unto You.
Chorus:
So, help me, Lord, to be faithful to my calling,
That in due time I can be known with Your chosen few;
And if I falter, my mind wavers, or my eyes begin to dim,
Let Your faithfulness continue to deal with me, to let You deal within.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thank You, Lord, for leading me to a walk of obedience;
A walk that chooses God's own will, desiring nothing less
A walk that's pure and holy; travailing in the narrow way
A walk that exercises faith, and waits to listen and see.
